name: Carnage screensaver-game
description:
Press Space to jump, Esc to quit.
A local gangsta is trying to run you down -
Humiliate them by jumping over their new car!
When enraged, they will lean from the window -
Grab their gun before they can shoot at you!

Tip: Time your jumps to the honking horn.
Display: Yellow=Car-speed/Red=Rage-meter
